articles.author: Jason Felix
articles.title: 'A torchbearer of our post-apartheid Parliament': Frene Ginwala hailed, mourned - News24
articles.description: South Africa has lost one of the foremost iconic leaders of its liberation struggle.
articles.content:
• The first Speaker of the National Assembly in a democratic South Africa, Frene Ginwala, has died.
  • Ginwala died on Thursday, at the age of 90, following a stroke two weeks ago.

articles.author: N. TRISHA
articles.title: ASF outbreak in Penang a 'disaster', says CM - The Star Online
articles.description: BUTTERWORTH: The state has declared the African Swine Fever (ASF) outbreak here a "disaster" after cases were reported in five more commercial pig farms in two districts.

articles.title: Rwanda: Health Official Dispels Myths Around Recent Bout of Flu - AllAfrica - Top Africa News
articles.description: The bout of influenza that affected a lot of people towards the end of 2022 and the New Year has nothing to do with the Covid-19 virus and nor is it in any way related to vaccination.
articles.content:

articles.title: PANDEMIC UPDATE: The 'incredibly transmissible' Kraken could take over as dominant Covid-19 strain in South Africa - Daily Maverick
articles.description: Looking at information from the US, the ‘incredibly transmissible’ XBB.1.5 subvariant of Omicron might become the dominant Covid-19 strain in South Africa, the National Institute for Communicable Diseases said on Wednesday.
